pr_title: Support BYTES type for group-by expression

timeline.author: siddharthteotia

replies.bodyText: The main difference is from the entry-set and iterator implementation of the fastutil maps. For an example, Int2IntMap.entrySet() is marked deprecated and the class suggest using the type-specific method instead. Also, we are able to use the fastIterator() provided by the FastEntrySet, and also the unboxed values to reduce the garbage, and the unnecessary boxing/unboxing.
replies.author: Jackie-Jiang
